definition: hardworking and thrifty in running one's household
to build up the country through thrift and hard work (idiom)
hardwork and thriftiness are the foundations of service (idiom)
pinyin: qin2 jian3 wei2 fu2 wu4 zhi1 ben3

definition: diligent and able to endure hardship (idiom)
to rise up by thrift and hard work (idiom)
to run an enterprise diligently and thriftily
to run a school diligently and thriftily
to run an organization diligently and thriftily

sentences.english: The principle of diligence and frugality applies to all undertakings.
sentences.chinese: 勤俭节约的原则适用于一切事业。

sentences.english: Her mother is a thrifty housewife.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲是一个勤俭的主妇。

sentences.english: Hardworking and thrift are admirable traditional elements of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 勤俭节约是民族的优良传统。

sentences.english: The other reason to spend money slowly is to encourage a culture of cheapness.
sentences.chinese: 另一个节省开支的用意是形成一种勤俭的文化。

sentences.english: The bribery crime to do the nation, rich and poor regret not when.
sentences.chinese: 官行贿赂致罪悔，富不勤俭贫时悔。

sentences.english: We must not equate thrift with stinginess .
sentences.chinese: 我们不能把勤俭和吝啬等同起来。

sentences.english: Be thrifty and hardworking in whatever undertaking you are to start on.
Competition to be held in ensuring the successful premise, thriftiness , savings.
sentences.chinese: 在保证比赛圆满举行的前提下，勤俭节约，节省经费。

sentences.english: But there is more to it than pleasant weather and belt-tightening.
sentences.chinese: 然而除了好天气和勤俭节约之外，还有更多的原因。

sentences.english: Protect public assets; treasure resources, be diligent & thrifty, and be committed to common development.
sentences.chinese: 爱护公物，珍惜资源，勤俭节约，共同发展。

sentences.english: Wealth flows from industry and economy.
Working hard and frugal are both virtues.
sentences.chinese: 艰苦奋斗和勤俭节约均是美德。

sentences.english: We should cultivate the good habits of diligence and frugality.
sentences.chinese: 我们要养成勤俭节约的好风气。

sentences.english: It can help to train the students'team-work spirit and virtue of thrifty.
sentences.chinese: 它有助于培养学生的团队精神和勤俭朴素的美德。

sentences.english: She ran her apartment with thrift and bought her clothes at trade prices.
sentences.chinese: 她持家勤俭，买衣裳花的是批发价钱。

sentences.english: We should run all undertakings industrially and thriftily.
sentences.chinese: 我们要勤俭办一切事业。

definition: hardworking and thrifty in running one's household
